msContents.summary: The 10th book of Maimonides' Mishneh Torah, i.e. Sefer ṭohorah.

collation.p: 17 quires of 10 leaves each. Last leaf in the last quire cancelled. Quires numbered with Hebrew letters at the beginning. Numbering partly cut away.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 13th century.
